imdb.plot outline: 2 Roommates decide to move houses, a move they have been planning for a long time. Everything seems alright at first until things get weird. Devin (Devin M.) sees a murderer outside and wakes Darius (Darius D.) up, but doesn't believe him. Darius thinks his friend is just paranoid, but Devin thinks Darius is the one behind the entire thing.
imdb.title: NightFall
plot: Two roommates move houses and are greeted by a shocking find. A murderer becomes on the lose every October. Nobody knows if they can make it out alive.::Devin M.

2 Roommates decide to move houses, a move they have been planning for a long time. Everything seems alright at first until things get weird. Devin (Devin M.) sees a murderer outside and wakes Darius (Darius D.) up, but doesn't believe him. Darius thinks his friend is just paranoid, but Devin thinks Darius is the one behind the entire thing.::Devin M.
